interests.Filter: O a mea e te fiafia i ai?
interests.CanAdd: Afai e le mafai ona e maua le mea o loʻo e sailia, e mafai ona e faaopoopoina se fiafia fou i lalo:
interests.TrySynonyms: Aua le vaai i ai? Taumafai nisi synonyms.
interests.AddUnderCategory: Faʻaopoopo i lalo o le vaega ...

chat.flaggedForAdminReview: Ua maeʻa le feʻau mo le iloiloga a le suʻega. Toe toe faʻaulu i tua.
chat.noOneSaid: E leai se isi na fai mai se mea
chat.closeChatConfirm: E te mautinoa e te manaʻo e tapuni lenei talatalanoaga?
chat.notAllowedToJoinCall: E leai sau faʻatagaga e auai i lenei talanoaga.

dialog.photoInstruction: Afai o le tagata na siaki lau QR code o loʻo i ou luma, ave se ata o ia mea
dialog.title: Valaaulia
dialog.orInvite: Pe valaaulia tagata e ala i le faʻaaoga:
dialog.scannedQR: {{ClickOrTap}} pe afai na siakiina le code

email.subject: Hey, siaki le mea lenei
email.PleaseVisitLink: Faamolemole asiasi i le sootaga lenei:
email.InvitingYou: O loʻo ou valaauliaina oe i {{title}}

sms.content: Ua valaaulia oe i {{title}}. Faamolemole tap {{url}}

notice.text: Ua valaaulia oe. {{ClickOrTap}} iinei e talia ma auai.

invite.youCanNowPaste: E mafai nei ona e faapipii lenei sootaga i se mea e valaaulia ai tagata

mobile.alert: O valaaulia e auina mai le numera, lea e leʻi iloa e au uo. Suʻe faʻatasi ma se faʻamatalaga vave e taʻu atu ia i latou o le valaaulia na sau mai ia te oe, fai atu ia i latou e kiliki le sootaga.
mobile.confirm: O valaaulia e auina mai le numera, lea e leʻi iloa e au uo. Mata e te manaʻo e tulitatao i se faʻamatalaga vave e taʻu atu ia i latou o le valaaulia na sau mai ia te oe, fai atu ia i latou e kiliki le sootaga.
mobile.check: Hey, faatoa ou auina atu ia te oe se valaaulia i le {{app}} app. Faamolemole siaki lau sms ma kiliki le sootaga!
mobile.CheckYourMobile: Faamolemole siaki SMS ma mulimuli i faatonuga!

email.alert: O valaaulia e auina atu mai la tatou itu, lea e leʻi iloa e au uo. Suʻe faʻatasi ma se faʻamatalaga vave e taʻu atu ia i latou o le valaaulia na sau mai ia te oe, fai atu ia i latou e kiliki le sootaga.
email.confirm: O valaaulia e auina atu mai la tatou itu, lea e leʻi iloa e au uo. Mata e te manaʻo e tulitatao i se faʻamatalaga vave e taʻu atu ia i latou o le valaaulia na sau mai ia te oe, fai atu ia i latou e kiliki le sootaga.
email.subject: Na e mauaina se valaaulia?
email.body: Hey, faatoa ou auina atu ia te oe se valaaulia i le {{app}} app. Faamolemole siaki lau imeli ma kiliki le sootaga i totonu!
email.CheckYourEmail: Faamolemole siaki lau imeli ma mulimuli i faatonuga!

allow.cameraAndMicrophoneTitle: Faʻamaonia le Kamera ma le Masini
allow.cameraAndMicrophoneBtn: Faʻamaonia le Kamera ma le Masini

webInstructionsDialog.permissionDenied: Faʻatagaina mo le {{kind}} faafitia. Le faʻaaogaina faamolemole mulimuli i laasaga nei:
webInstructionsDialog.point1: Alu i le "Faʻatonu" -> "Faʻalauteleina" -> "Faʻamatalaga o le Nofoaga" -> "Kamera" poʻo le "Faʻamaumauga o le Pae" -> "Telefoni"

webIosInstructionsDialog.permissionDenied: Faʻatagaina mo le {{kind}} faafitia. Faʻamolemole toe sii mai lenei itulau ma faʻamaonia avanoa i {{kind}} e auai i le fonotaga.

settingsPopup.turnOffVideo: Tapē le mea pueata / faʻafesoʻotaʻi lau

webrtc.notAllowedToJoinCall: E leai sau faʻatagaina e te auai i lenei vaitafe.

Streams\/resource.description: vaitafe mo le puleaina o avanoa i se punaʻoa ma le lafoina o savali e uiga i faʻaleleia

Streams\/task.description: mo le mauaina o faʻamatalaga e uiga i le alualu i luma i se galuega faapitoa

Streams\/experience.description: o se masani masani mo tagata o le alaalafaga
Streams\/experience.displayType: Le masani masani mo tagata o le alaalafaga

Streams\/greeting.description: faʻafeiloaʻiga lea e mafai ai e se faʻaaoga ona faʻalauiloaina i latou lava

Streams\/album.description: se lipine e fesoʻotaʻi faʻatasi ai le aufaasālalau

Streams\/category.description: se vaega e mafai ona fesootai i ai isi vaitafe

Streams\/participating.description: vaitafe e fesoʻotai / le fesoʻotaʻi i lenei mea pe a faʻatasi se tagata faʻapipiʻi / lau

Streams\/interest.description: e faʻatusa ai le fiafia o se tagata i se autu

Streams\/incoming.description: taunuʻuga mo savali na lafoina e isi tagata faʻaoga

Streams\/chat.description: se talanoaga i le va o tagata faaaoga, ma le talafaasolopito

Streams\/webrtc.description: se taimi moni video / leo telefoni
